info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new EState and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the EState with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: EState with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the EState with the requested ID.

204.description: EState with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a EState and persists changes to storage.

get.description: Find the attached Event of the EState with the given ID

200.description: Event attached to EState with requested ID was found
